title: Enter your property address
placeholder: e.g. 123 High Street, London, Greater London, SW1A 1AA

helperText.initialized: Start typing to search for your address, or enter it manually
helperText.notInitialized: For best results, include street, town, county and postcode separated by commas

errors.required: Please enter an address to continue
errors.serviceUnavailable: Address lookup service unavailable. Please enter your address manually.
errors.searchError: Error searching for addresses. Please try again or enter manually.
errors.initializationError: Failed to initialize address lookup. Please enter your address manually.
